about_the_game:
HYPURRX IS A SPEED-RUNNER, CUTE n SHOOT-EM-UP, BULLET-HELL GAME!

Join the epic battle between the Klaudrian astro-cats and the Mischuhf pirate rat brigade in this exhilarating fast-paced arcade game.

Create your Cat Pilot. Customize your ship and styles, and head to the raceways to earn Creds. You will need to fully maximize your loadout to get the perfect scores in the trenches with the mecha pirates.

Each stage offers a variety of play styles and meowchievements to attain.
Prove yourself on track and climb the global championship leaderboards!

Will you be able to lead Captain Usui of the Mach Eight Orbital Watch (M.E.O.W) to victory, or will Osgoods' Mischuhf Pirates dominate the raceways? The fate of Planet Klaudrian is in your hands!

name: HypurrX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: HypurrX is a gritty sci-fi arcade style cute-em-up. Say whaaat?Pilot your cat companion through a brutal onslaught of enemy waves and epic boss battles. Challenge the global leaderboards in this single player bullet hell trench runner.
